title: Pose
description: The pose of a device or vehicle given as a combination of its position (longitude, latitude, and altitude of its reference point) and attitude (yaw, pitch, and roll Euler angles). The Euler angles follow the yaw-pitch-roll convention and correspond to a coordinate system where the origo is at the 'reference point', the x-axis is positive forwards, and the z-axis is positive downwards.

position.title: Reference point position
position.description: Position of the reference point encoded as a GeoJSON Point

reference_point_type.title: Reference point type
reference_point_type.desciption: Type of reference point. For type 'ais', as depicted by Figure 41 in the ITU recommendation M.1371-5 (https://www.itu.int/rec/R-REC-M.1371-5-201402-I/en).

yaw.title: Yaw angle
yaw.description: Yaw angle of the device or vehicle (aka. heading) [radians]

pitch.title: Pitch angle
pitch.description: Pitch angle of the device or vehicle [radians]

roll.title: Roll angle
roll.description: Roll angle of the device or vehicle [radians]
